desc: Homemade candles made with certified Clean Scents! Safe for the environment and safe for you! These are created with the most love and creativity to develop a catchy brand with scents you can only dream of! A mom and wife who decided to go for her dream of starting her own business. I decided to let go, and let God.

layout.text: A Momtrepreneur who decided to follow her dreams and start her very own unique candle business!
